android.os
Class PbdManager

java.lang.Object
  android.os.PbdManager

public final class PbdManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides access to the system PBD services. These services allow applications to obtain periodic updates of the device's geographical location, or to obtain the identifiers and contacts information.

You do not instantiate this class directly; instead, retrieve it through {android.content.Context#getSystemService Context.getSystemService(Context.PBD_SERVICE)}. All sensitive information access requires the system to have the corresponding DPA installed. Each method for accessing sensitive information is also required to pass in a app identity key.

Method Detail

requestLocationUpdates

public java.lang.String requestLocationUpdates(java.lang.String key,
                                               long minTime,
                                               float minDistance,
                                               java.lang.String provider)
Method used by apps to request location updates. App is notified of new location by a intent broadcast. Returns "Invalid Request" if request was illegal.

requestSingleUpdate

public java.lang.String requestSingleUpdate(java.lang.String key,
                                            java.lang.String provider)
Request a single location update from the Listener. Returns "Invalid Request" if request was illegal.

removeLocationUpdates

public void removeLocationUpdates(java.lang.String key)
Removes location updates if the app has a registered. Listener. Does not unregister the listener.

getPbdLocation

public PbdLocation getPbdLocation(java.lang.String key)
Gets the most recent PbdLocation. Called by app when it receives broadcast intent to fetch the location received by the listener.

getDeviceId

public java.lang.String getDeviceId(java.lang.String key)
Returns the unique device ID, for example, the IMEI for GSM and the MEID or ESN for CDMA phones. Returns null if unavailable. Returns "refused" if authenitcation is not granted. Returns "error" if there is an error in making authentication request.

getSimSerialNumber

public java.lang.String getSimSerialNumber(java.lang.String key)
Returns the serial number of the SIM, if applicable. Returns null if unavailable. Returns "refused" if authenitcation is not granted. Returns "error" if there is an error in making authentication request.

getAndroidId

public java.lang.String getAndroidId(java.lang.String key)
Returns a 64-bit number (as a hex string) that is randomly generated when the user first sets up the device and should remain constant for the lifetime of the user's device. The value may change if a factory reset is performed on the device. Returns null if unavailable. Returns "refused" if authenitcation is not granted. Returns "error" if there is an error in making authentication request.

getGroupIdLevel1

public java.lang.String getGroupIdLevel1(java.lang.String key)
Returns the Group Identifier Level1 for a GSM phone. Returns null if unavailable. Returns "refused" if authenitcation is not granted. Returns "error" if there is an error in making authentication request.

getLine1Number

public java.lang.String getLine1Number(java.lang.String key)
Returns the Line1Number for the device. Returns null if unavailable. Returns "refused" if authenitcation is not granted. Returns "error" if there is an error in making authentication request.

getSubscriberId

public java.lang.String getSubscriberId(java.lang.String key)
Returns the Subscriber Id for the device. Returns null if unavailable. Returns "refused" if authenitcation is not granted. Returns "error" if there is an error in making authentication request.

getVoiceMailAlphaTag

public java.lang.String getVoiceMailAlphaTag(java.lang.String key)
Returns the Voicemail Alpha Tag for the device. Returns null if unavailable. Returns "refused" if authenitcation is not granted. Returns "error" if there is an error in making authentication request.
